body: At Japan Subculture Research Center's blog, Richard Orange and Ikuru Kuwajima tell  the story [en] of "one Japanese POW trapped in the Soviet Union after the end of the Second World War."
original_body: At Japan Subculture Research Center's blog, Richard Orange and Ikuru Kuwajima tell the story [en] of "one Japanese POW trapped in the Soviet Union after the end of the Second World War."
title: Japan: The last Japanese man remaining in Kazakhstan
